name: Saffron & Pinkerton - 2 Player Local Coop
description:
Together, take control of Saffron the bird and their salamander friend Pinkerton to find a cure for Saffron's father's illness! 

One player controls Pinkerton and the other controls Saffron - but both have to work together as one unit!

Pinkerton is able to move around while Saffron can use telepathic magic from Pinkerton's back to wield their father's mighty shovel!

______________________________________________

CONTROLS:

PINKERTON (player 1)

WASD:
move around

SPACE BAR:
imbue SHOVEL with fiery salamander energy
(1.5s duration, 4s cooldown)

B key:
respawn Shovel
(0.5s cooldown)

SAFFRON (player 2)

LEFT MOUSE CLICK:
cast magic!
(grab, drag and drop objects like the shovel, objects or enemies)

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK:
give PINKERTON a speed boost!
(2.5s cooldown)
